commits: fa0609c: fix(claude-session): improve first message send reliability
summary: Issue #187 TDD implementation complete. All P0/P1 changes implemented: (P0) Added CLAUDE_POST_PROMPT_DELAY stability wait in sendMessageToClaude() for both Path A (immediate prompt) and Path B (waitForPrompt). (P1-1) Removed CLAUDE_SEPARATOR_PATTERN from startClaudeSession() initialization check. (P1-2) Removed try-catch to propagate timeout errors. (P1-3) Added CLAUDE_SEND_PROMPT_WAIT_TIMEOUT constant (10000ms). All 28 tests pass, TypeScript and ESLint clean.

acceptance_criteria_results.stability_delay_after_waitForPrompt: PASS - CLAUDE_POST_PROMPT_DELAY applied after waitForPrompt returns in sendMessageToClaude()
acceptance_criteria_results.stability_delay_on_immediate_prompt: PASS - CLAUDE_POST_PROMPT_DELAY applied when prompt immediately detected (Path A)
acceptance_criteria_results.separator_pattern_not_used_for_init: PASS - startClaudeSession() no longer uses CLAUDE_SEPARATOR_PATTERN for initialization check
acceptance_criteria_results.timeout_throws_error: PASS - waitForPrompt timeout throws Error instead of silently sending message
acceptance_criteria_results.timeout_uses_constant: PASS - sendMessageToClaude uses CLAUDE_SEND_PROMPT_WAIT_TIMEOUT (10000ms) instead of hardcoded value
acceptance_criteria_results.no_regression_on_subsequent_messages: PASS - existing sendKeys tests updated and pass with stability delay
